mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Built for Charles and Emma Williams. Daughter Jeannie Jewett Williams (Pratt) inherited the mansion in 1909. The City of Buffalo bought it at public auction in 1938. In 1940, the Buffalo Common Council voted to dedicate the mansion to the Veterans of the GAR and to the Spanish War Vets for use as a meeting place and the storage for records. The vets officially moved into the "GAR Memorial hall" April 15, 1941. Currently owned by the LiRo Group (construction). -- https://buffaloah.com/a/del/690/hist/hist.html [work]
